body_html:
Thanks, this is long requested.

I'm not sure what's up with the build errors:

08:54:52 /usr/bin/ld: CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CUDAHalfStorage.cpp.o: relocation R_X86_64_PC32 against undefined symbol `_ZN2atL7HalfFixINS_4HalfE6__halfEET_T0_' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC

Are you able to repro this locally?

body:
Thanks, this is long requested.

I'm not sure what's up with the build errors:

```
08:54:52 /usr/bin/ld: CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/ATen/CUDAHalfStorage.cpp.o: relocation R_X86_64_PC32 against undefined symbol `_ZN2atL7HalfFixINS_4HalfE6__halfEET_T0_' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
```

Are you able to repro this locally?
